name: Corrie J. Confurius Coughtrey
part_bio: On Sunday, February 14, 2016 of St. Marys and formerly of Huron Park in her 100th year. Beloved wife of the late Earl Coughtrey (1987). Dear mother of Marina Morrissey of Exeter and Sandy and Dave MacPherson of St. Marys. Dear grandmother and great-grandmother. Predeceased by a son Fred Coughtrey (1972). Corrie was the last remaining of her 15 siblings. She came to Canada as a war bride from Holland.
bio:
COUGHTREY Earl
Joseph
Dec. 11, 1923
June 18. 1987
Corrie J.
(Confurius)
Aug. 21, 1916
Feb. 14, 2016
In God we trust
